meanings.sent1: The puppy was unresistant to the gentle touch of its owner.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was unresistant to water, making it perfect for rainy days.
meanings.sent3: The unresistant door swung open easily with a slight push.
meanings.sent4: Her unresistant nature allowed others to easily influence her decisions.
meanings.sent5: The unresistant soil absorbed the rain quickly, preventing any flooding.

meanings.definition: Unable to withstand or fight against something.
meanings.sent1: The unresistant plant withered quickly under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: The unresistant material tore easily when stretched.
meanings.sent3: The unresistant balloon popped as soon as it touched a sharp object.
meanings.sent4: His unresistant body succumbed to the virus within days.
meanings.sent5: The unresistant dam collapsed under the pressure of the floodwaters.
